Package com.example.moodmobile

    Interface Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    TODO Default File Template Created by Derek.R on 2017-03-07.
    AddJobService
    This class is controlled By the system and runs when a job is scheduled to run.
    AddMood
    The type Add mood.
    AddNewFriendActivity
    This class is to handle the sending of friend requests, receiving of friend requests
    BuildConfig  
    CreateAccount
    This activity allows users to create a new account, ElasticsearchAccountController.GetUser(username) is used to test if the username is already exist in database.
    CustomListAdapter
    The adapter to the ArrayList that contains the moods belonging to a user.
    DeleteJobService
    Created by shingai on 02/04/17.
    ElasticsearchAccountController
    The controller used by the application to get accounts from ElasticSearch
    ElasticsearchAccountController.AddUser
    When a new user is created, the method is called to create the user in the ElasticSearch server.
    ElasticsearchAccountController.GetUser
    Given a username, gets the user's profile from the ElasticSearch server.
    ElasticsearchAccountController.UpdateAccountTask
    Given a modified account, deletes the account and the creates the account again.
    ElasticsearchMoodController
    The controller used by the application to get moods from ElasticSearch
    ElasticsearchMoodController.AddMoodsTask
    Given a new mood, send it to the ElasticSearch server to store.
    ElasticsearchMoodController.DeleteMoodsTask
    Sends request to the ElasticSearch server to delete a particular mood.
    ElasticsearchMoodController.GetMoodsTaskByID
    Given a particular ID, searches the ElasticSearch server for the particular corresponding mood.
    ElasticsearchMoodController.GetMoodsTaskByName
    Gets moods by username, sorts them from latest first
    ElasticsearchMoodController.GetNearMoodsTask
    Given the users current location, returns the moods within a 5km radius.
    ElasticsearchMoodController.UpdateMoodsTask
    Updates a mood by deleting it, and then completely rebuilding it.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumentation test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FriendsActivity
    This class controlls the functionality of displaying your following list.
    LoginPage
    This activity allows users to login with a valid username.
    MainPageActivity
    This is the main page activity that the user sees when the log into the application.
    Mood
    This is the main class used to implement the moods in the application.
    Osm_mapView
    this is the MapView activity.

    TestAccount  
    TestMood  
    UpdateJobService
    Created by shingai on 02/04/17.
    UserProfile
    This is the activity that allows users to edit their profile
    ViewEditMood
    This class will view the properties of, and allow editing of the properties of a given selectedMood.
    ViewFriendRequests  
    ViewGuestProfile
    This class is to view the information of a person who has sent you a following request.
